detail_desc: Fitted blouse in a viscose weave with a square neckline front and back, a seam under the bust and smocking at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim over the shoulders and at the hems. Jersey lining at the front.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length approx. 7 cm.

Shirt in soft, lightweight premium cotton flannel with a cutaway collar and French front. Open chest pocket, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and elastication at the hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a padded heel and tongue. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Knee-length A-line skirt in imitation leather. High waist with press-studs and a concealed zip at one side, and decorative seams front and back. Unlined.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and straight legs.

Ankle-length jeans in cotton denim with a paper bag waist that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back. Pleats at the front, a zip fly and a contrasting colour belt in a double layer of twill with metal D-rings. Back pockets, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Pair of airy, ribbed leggings in a soft silk blend with an elasticated waist and extra-long legs.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with sleeves and a detachable, jersey-lined hood in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Collar, press-studs down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and ribbed cuffs.
Sleeveless top in jersey with gathered elastication around the neckline and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in superstretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover front, flounce trim at the top and short flounced sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a gently draping skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
3/4-length trousers in stretch twill with embroidered motifs at the top, an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.

Long, padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood, a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the waist and elastication and adjustable tabs with buttons at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
V-neck top in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Joggers in a cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a twisted detail at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist with narrow elastication and a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with an opening at the back, decorative ties at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Calf-length, A-line dress in crisp, organic cotton poplin with a V-shaped opening at the top and stand-up collar with narrow ties. Short, voluminous, embroidered raglan puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a visible seam down the front and back. Unlined.

Short dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. Double-layered with a short, wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Long raglan sleeves. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Cropped vest top in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the back and lace trim at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy jacquard weave with a high collar. Opening at the back with concealed buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip below. Long, gathered puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and long sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in silk with a high, smocked waist. Unlined.
Cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 2 cm.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and deep kangaroo pockets. Contrasting colour grosgrain trims down the sleeves, elastication at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Fleece lining.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a padded, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and zipped side pockets. Detachable, elasticated belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Short sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with a washed look.
T-shirt in pima cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with a print motif, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Patterned canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.

prod_name: MACY OTS DR V5 OR FLOUNCE
detail_desc: Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with covered elastication at the top and short sleeves.

Short, sleeveless dress in lace with scalloped edges. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam with a band of hem-stitched embroidery at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs with patches.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
Fitted top in a soft, fine, textured knit with short puff sleeves that have narrow trims with concealed elastication.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Sandals in imitation leather and denim with a heel strap and a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Blouse in soft viscose jersey with an opening with ties at the top, a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be adjusted at the sides.

Short, A-line dress in a crinkled viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with ties at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the hem and on the sleeves for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Large, rectangular hair clips in metal decorated with glass beads. Length 7.5 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringed trims.
Longer cardigan in an airy pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Loafers in velour with textile linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in lace with a concealed silicone trim at the top and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Trousers in soft velour corduroy with a high, elasticated waist, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with sewn-in creases down the front and a flare to the hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with buttoned lace cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and slim legs with ribbed hems.
Calf-length, lace pencil skirt with grosgrain ribbon at the waist, a concealed zip and button at the side and a slit at the back. Lined.
